item.title: (Bit)Torrent as File Transfer Protocol
item.description: Before I begin I might need to address that: I do not endorse the act and practice of piracy. This post is intended to be personal documentation on alternative use of BitTorrent and BitTorrent protocol as a way to transfer file over network.

item.title: Ubuntu - Add Custom Package Vendors
item.description: Sometimes software vendors provides their own repository for specific releases. For instance qbittorrent latest releases might not be available on apt database, thus we can use their ppa as an alternative for latest stable releases under ppa:qbittorrent-team/qbittorrent-stable.

item.title: Win11 Debloat
